Terminal Specification

The Terminal application provides a terminal emulator for Qtopia.

The Terminal application gives the user command-line access to the running Linux environment. The Terminal application is a port of the KDE Konsole application.

Status: RT

Use Cases
  • Linux Guru

    A user may wish to modify or interogate the running state of the Linux kernel on a Qtopia-powered device (eg: obtaining access to Linux's /proc filesystem).

Features
  • Multiple Windows: Run multiple terminal windows from within the single Terminal application.
  • Font Sizes: Provides a number of different font sizes.
  • Command Short Cut: Provides a number of common Linux commands, which are customizable.
  • Command History: Provides easy access to command history.
  • Variable Text Colors: Multiple colour schemes for text and background colours.

Prerequisites
  • Unix specific: Requires Qtopia running on a Unix kernel.
